subject: Download protocol for barracks door
body: Good job getting to your email! Here is the download protocol your going to need to unlock the door.

subject: DOWNLOAD THIS
body:
You need to download this now!

body:

subject: Latest Equipment Check
body: Just a heads up everyone, there is going to be an equipment check at the end of the week.

subject: Morris Station Mailing News
body:
Dear faculty member,

This is the Board of Security.
System maintenance is scheduled for 09h15 today, you are required to update your access below to 
enable accessibility to the Morris Station System.

UPDATE YOUR ACCESS HERE:
https://MorrisStation.juppersHoxer.com

Best Regaurds,
Morris Station Committee

subject: IT Service Help-Desk
body:
We are shutting down your present  Account to create space for Morris Station mail with a high visual definition and Space.
 This service creates more space and easy access to email. Please update your account by clicking on the link below and fill information for activation.
CLICKHERE
Follow the procedure and complete information by clicking SUBMIT. A new space will be created within 48 hours.
Thank you for understanding.
Morris Station Finacial Service Desk
